headline: Corrections & Amplifications
summary: CORRECTIONS  Hewlett Packard Enterprise hired Arthur Schwartz, a political strategist close to Donald J. Trump Jr., to advise it. A U.S. News article on Thursday about U.S. antitrust investigations incorrectly said that Live Nation and HPE both hired Schwartz.

raw.headline: Corrections & Amplifications
raw.summary: CORRECTIONS  Hewlett Packard Enterprise hired Arthur Schwartz, a political strategist close to Donald J. Trump Jr., to advise it. A U.S. News article on Thursday about U.S. antitrust investigations incorrectly said that Live Nation and HPE both hired Schwartz.

headline: Krispy Kreme Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results and Announces Turnaround Plan
summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C., August 07, 2025--Krispy Kreme, Inc. (NASDAQ: DNUT) ("Krispy Kreme", "KKI", or the "Company") today reported financial results for the quarter ended June 29, 2025, and outlined a turnaround plan designed to deleverage the balance sheet and drive sustainable, profitable growth.

raw.headline: Krispy Kreme Reports Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results and Announces Turnaround Plan
raw.summary: CHARLOTTE, N.C., August 07, 2025--Krispy Kreme, Inc. (NASDAQ: DNUT) ("Krispy Kreme", "KKI", or the "Company") today reported financial results for the quarter ended June 29, 2025, and outlined a turnaround plan designed to deleverage the balance sheet and drive sustainable, profitable growth.

headline: Restaurant Brands beats quarterly sales estimates on improving fast-food demand
summary: The company ramped up its advertising and promotional efforts, leaning on movies such as 'How to train your Dragon' and partnerships with actor Ryan Reynolds, to attract customers in core regions such as the U.S. and Canada.  Like most major fast-food chains, including Yum Brands and McDonald's, Burger King has also introduced value-meal deals starting at $5 to boost foot traffic as consumer spending in the U.S. sees a decline amid concerns over tariff-related impact.

raw.headline: Restaurant Brands beats quarterly sales estimates on improving fast-food demand

headline: McDonald's (MCD) Reports Strong Earnings Growth & Completes US$953 Million Share Buyback
summary: McDonald's (MCD) recorded a 4.81% price increase over the past month, a performance bolstered by recent company developments. The announcement of strong earnings for Q2 2025, with a revenue rise to $6,843 million and a net income increase, likely contributed positively to investor sentiment. Additionally, updates on the company’s share buyback program, alongside the reaffirmed $1.77 quarterly cash dividend, further supported shareholder value. While the market remained largely unchanged over...

summary: We recently published 10 Stocks Jim Cramer Talked About As He Warned About “Have-Not” Stocks. Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc. (NYSE:CMG) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Chipotle Mexican Grill, Inc. (NYSE:CMG)’s shares dipped by 13% after the firm’s second quarter earnings. The results saw the firm’s $3.06 billion revenue miss analyst estimates […]
